entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a person who is speaking to Voldemort and seems to be involved in the conversation about the boy's transfer.

entities.name: dawlish
entities.description: Dawlish is a person mentioned by Yaxley as believing an entire party of Aurors will be used to transfer the boy.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who is being addressed by Yaxley and seems to be in charge.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who is speaking to Voldemort about the boy's transfer.

entities.name: boy
entities.description: The boy is an object being referred to in the conversation about his transfer.

entities.name: order of the order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is an organization mentioned by Snape as providing protection for the boy's hiding place.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is an organization mentioned by Snape and Voldemort as being involved in the conversation about the boy's transfer.

relationships.description: Dawlish believes an entire party of Aurors will be used to transfer the boy.
Yaxley is questioning the Ministry of Magic about whether they will have fallen by next Saturday.
Voldemort is involved in the conversation with the Ministry of Magic about the boy's transfer.
